entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enum.ToObject(Type, object) method overload handles nint and nuint types incorrectly #106098
  • CI failure RegularExpressions didn't throw expected TimeoutException #106096
  • CI failure in DecimalTests BigIntegerAdd #106095
  • WasmTestOnChrome-MT-System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests timeout #106094
  • Enable AltJit usage with disassembly-checked tests #106093
    Future
  • Analyzer 'Microsoft.NetCore.CSharp.Analyzers.Performance.CSharpConstantExpectedAnalyzer' threw an exception of type 'System.InvalidCastException` #106088
    Future
  • [Tracing] EventProvider Disposal hangs within a callback #106087
    10.0.0
  • failure in BidirectionStreamingTest.BackwardsCompatibility_DowngradeToHttp11 #106086
    8.0.x
  • Runtime crashing under WSL2 on Volterra #106081
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `AdvSimd.Insert` #106079
    9.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Unable to load the service index for source https://pkgs.dev.azure.com/dnceng/public/..../index.json #106074
  • [mono] FullAOT build asserts at `class1 != ARG_CLASS_NO_CLASS' for EmptyStructs.dll #106071
  • Object cloning does not work in maui #106077
  • [browser][MT] Could not load file or assembly System.Runtime.InteropServices #106067
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add TryGetReadOnlySpan<T>() to CollectionsMarshal for ReadOnlyCollection<T> #106066
  • [mono][ios] Mono prevents crash logs from being generated in case `SIGSEGV` is raised from native code #106064
    9.0.0
  • Performance delay when filtering a DataTable using the DefaultView.RowFilter property #106061

Closed

  • [GC] DATAS Startup time significantly worse than with workstation GC #94076
    9.0.0
  • ARM64: Fuzzlyn example Debug outputs `False` and Release outputs `True` #105413
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(intrinsicInfo.numArgs == -1) || (sig->numArgs == static_cast<uint8_t>(intrinsicInfo.numArgs))' during 'Morph - Inlining' (IL size 568; hash 0xb #105922
    9.0.0
  • tracing/eventpipe/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror failure #80666
    9.0.0
  • Dump file not created when process crashes #104256
    9.0.0
  • Add VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension support in mono #83891
    Future
  • ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationType throws exception for Keyed descriptor: System.InvalidOperationException: This service descriptor is keyed. Your service provider may not support keyed services. #95789
    9.0.0
  • Parameter name stripping breaks debugger #102873
    9.0.0
  • Assert in InsertPInvokeMethodEpilog #103853
    9.0.0
  • Different behavior of FromKeyedServices attribute in Minimal APIs handler vs class library #102204
    9.0.0
  • Unable to use a enum as a key for keyed services in controller constructor #96140
    9.0.0
  • Segmentation Fault while debugging #105917
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.ServiceCanStopItself #103262
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.ServiceSequenceIsCorrect #93194
    9.0.0
  • Ensure argument validation is being done for the Tensor APIs #102267
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT doesn't apply `TrimmerSingleWarn=true` item metadata to the command line for the compiler #94255
    9.0.0
  • Audit the usage of `scoped` in the Tensor APIs #102266
    9.0.0
  • Add PersistedAssemblyBuilder tests to cover input and boundary cases #103086
    9.0.0
  • ILStrip task incorrectly adds a body to `extern` methods #102045
    9.0.0
  • Don't throw exception in ServiceDescriptor #99622
    9.0.0
  • [Apple] New Environment.CpuUsage tests failing on Apple mobile #105322
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed `user->OperIs(GT_CALL) && dsc->IsHiddenBufferStructArg() && (user->AsCall()->gtArgs.GetRetBufferArg()->GetNode() == lcl)` #105952
    9.0.0
  • Test failure:JIT/Methodical/doublearray/dblarray4_cs_ro/dblarray4_cs_ro.cmd #106057
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: Regressions in System.Collections.IndexerSet<String> #98174
    9.0.0
  • DefaultValueAttribute support change introduce new linker warnings #105857
    9.0.0
  • JIT: checked-release asmdiffs for libraries_tests.run.linux.arm64.Release.mch #105971
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Tests for Sve.AddSaturate() are failing #105799
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/RuntimeConfiguration/TestConfigTester/TestConfigTester.dll #103547
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests - Could not allocate #102195
    9.0.0
  • Error when calling a method from the NativeAOT static library. #105915
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 11 Regressions on 10/25/2023 1:04:28 PM #94228
    9.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Anlyzer for wrong usage of interpolated string with Logger methods #106041
    Future
  • NativeAOT (net9.0) error on linux-bionic-arm/arm64 #105880
    9.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfo_DisplayNameStartsWithOffset failures for Syria and Greenland #99727
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [CG] Bump Microsoft.IO.Redist to 6.0.1 #106102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #106101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • For `Sse41.Insert`, do not contain vec-zero on op1/op2 if the immediate value is greater than 63 #106100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add package readme to framework packages #106097
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: Skip `GT_CAST` removal in `Lowering::IsValidConstForMovImm` if it might change immediate #106092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure XML doc comments exist for the nested classes and IsSupported properties for intrinsics #106091
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Consume the existing instruction metadata when validating expected memory size #106090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `unsafe` modifier from `Memory<T>.Span` #106085
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Added all missing xml docs for Tensors #106084
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • STJ-SG: tolerate ref struct members with JsonIgnore. #106083
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Add os-ios, os-android etc labels to area section in resourceManagement.yml #106082
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Be more cautious about page zeroing #106080
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono
  • Add space in shared lib entrypoint option #106073
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Debug interp pgo test #106070
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Handle small buffer case in sortkey #106062
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix TimeZone Names #106056
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Set the initial spin count unit to 10 for DATAS. #105634
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #106052
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix loop memory dependence recording for memory defined in sibling loops #106076
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use correct IL offset when reporting dataflow warnings for return statements #105661
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [EventPipe] Block EventPipeProvider Deletion for ongoing callbacks #106040
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Linux createdump: skip/ignore ptrace suspend on threads that have terminated #106058
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ILLink: Keep parameter names unless DebuggerSupport is disabled #105714
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Split trees containing no-return calls to avoid creating illegal IR #105942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Do not allow a non-keyed service to be injected to a keyed parameter #105839
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • ActivatorUtilitier supports value typed values as key of keyedService. #106059
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Avoid calling GetCurrentInternalFrame if ExhaustedAllInternalFrames is true #106060
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix flaky tests in WindowsServiceLifetimeTests #105666
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix copy constructor injection for unsafe value classes #105961
    Servicing-approved, arch-x86, os-windows, area-Interop-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] longer timeouts for FS in MT, one test at the time #106078
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Pass `ManagedAssemblyToLink` with `TrimmerSingleWarn=true` metadata to ILC #106069
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Return null instead of throwing in ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationInstance\Type\Factory if a keyed service #105776
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Bump additional npm deps and lock file format #106019
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net
  • Add/update AssemblyBuilder/PersistedAssemblyBuilder tests covering boundary / edge case scenarios #105782
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Try Fix Cpu Usage Test #105891
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • Use SVE1 variants of AddSaturate and SubtractSaturate instructions #106068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Expose top-level address computations in local morph #106065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use `jitstd::utility::scoped_code` to unmark trees during lowering #106046
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix code generation for type conversion from float/double to uint/ulong. #105783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [wasm] Fix long branches in jiterpreter #106030
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make sure get_total_soh_stable_size never return zero #106043
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Mark AOT modules unusable if no AOT version is found #106026
    os-android, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] HijackFrame::UpdateRegDisplay update A0 #106018
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] Move RequiresAlign8 flag from RareFlags into ExtendedFlags #106010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [PERF] Remove --user from pip installs #106055
    area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure owning type of GVMs is kept #106016
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • EventSource startup initialization #106014
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Fixed a broken build with STRESS_DYNAMIC_HEAP_COUNT enabled #105507
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2510925 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix `Int128` checked-convert to signed IntX #105998
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix resolving types with primary constructors using in parameters #105928
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix trim analysis for assignment to multiple refs in single method call #105663
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Model GetFfr* with a special side effect and handle it in VN #105973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Bring back assert in fx_ver_t::parse #106050
    area-Host
  • Fix input size flag on `vpermd`. #106054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove implicit flush from BufferedStream.WriteByte #104822
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, Future
  • Arm64/Sve: DelayfreeUses for FMLA should take into account CndSel for RMW #105541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix compilation of NativeAOT with Xcode 16 #106039
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WASI] timers based on wasi:clocks #105879
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Add WebSocket Keep-Alive Ping and Timeout (minimal) implementation #105841
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • TimeOnlyConverter should tolerate more formats in line with TimeSpanConverter #106053
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add memory barriers to native AOT asm helpers #106004
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #106045
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix some core typeof(...) references #105903
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*FirstFaulting APIs #104964
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Assign latest virtual timestamp for added node to enable LRU manner of RegexCache #105746
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [browser][mono] Heap snapshot system for WASM #105713
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Add support for doubly nested intrinsic classes #105761
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add DI specification test for ensuring externally provided instance services are not disposed on provider disposal. #104853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Avoid containing non-embedded conditional select #105719 #105812
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Test llvm bump #105867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix a nested-externs warning in mono #104817
    area-Tracing-mono, community-contribution
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 Helix Images to pipeline #106048
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Emit Align8 flag for thread statics #105931
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Creating new TypeName without reparsing + usage in NRBF #103713
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization
  • fix infinite loop in foregroundgc test #106006
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added a fix for an incorrect assumption of an assertion failure re: failure to decommit. #105849
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Ilc is crashing on some input #2174
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [Question] RhpGcPoll implementation. #2644

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Compilation failure with async/EH/lock #2641
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Post-merge tasks #2472
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Outstanding tasks tracking issue #1828

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to August 6 #2647
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add support for building WASI and browser debug & release on Linux #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Central transitive pinning updates app.config but does not deploy dependencies #42608
  • Don't reference Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.Ref for C++/CLI projects #42599
  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload Sets] Running `dotnet workload restore` should install the workload set when using global.json #42582
  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload Sets] With manifest mode and workload installed, Unhandled exception occurs when running `dotnet workload --info` using global.json #42581
  • Getting System.NullReferenceException when running `dotnet tool update -g --all` #42598

Closed

  • Generating satellite assemblies causes a lot of unnecessary work #38478
  • dotnet watch run (--) --no-restore tries to restore NuGet packages #40172
    9.0.1xx
  • Need option to optimize NuGetFallbackFolder contents for Docker/build server scenarios #9057
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Permit workload restore to work with new global.json #42606
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [main] Enable the roslyn framework package only on C# and VB #42605
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42601
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add regression test for TrimmerSingleWarn with PublishAot #42583
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Reenable test in GivenThatWeWantToRunILLink.cs #42580
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • *DO NOT MERGE* Test install-script.sh #42579
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE

Merged

  • [Wasm] Fix request filters for blazor.boot.json #42607
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Enable specifying install search location options for published `apphost` #42455
    Area-Infrastructure, area-Host, untriaged
  • [Wasm] Moves wasm reload logic out of ASP.NET Core and into the SDK #42549
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Only publish artifacts on success #42574
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix .net 8.0 test templates #42585
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #42564
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid downloading of Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset when building in dogfood environment #42552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • ResolvePackageReferences: PackageDependenciesDesignTime inherits transitive package DiagnosticLevel #42546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2510744 #42570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42567
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support launchSettings.json workingDirectory with dotnet run #42534
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-07
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Polish and clarify prior field WG notes #8342
  • Conversions on extension types #8340

Merged

  • Fix notes #8311
  • Queue extension conversions for LDM #8341

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Partial properties on struct warn about field ordering #74679
  • Stack overflow when compiling incorrectly formed attribute argument string #74677
  • Collection Expression Generated Types miss the [CompilerGenerated] attribute #74676
  • InlineArray in generic class #74673

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35206.64 #74672

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Microsoft.VisualStudio.Debugger.Contracts to 17.12.0-beta.24403.1 #74678
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Make semantic APIs return more consistent results for `new T()` expressions #74675
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove test dependency from BuildValidator #74669
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Unify on-the-fly docs settings with C++ #74663
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix CG issue for Microsoft.IO.Redist #74653
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use EnableCodeStyleSeverity instead of AnalysisLevel to control new diagnostic severity behavior #73843
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractSymbolCompletionProvider.CreateItems #74670
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle various cases for field-backed properties #74641
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, mvc, plaintext #57216
  • Trailing comma in launchSettings.json breaks `dotnet watch` #57214
  • Loading progress .svg in the default Blazor template causes a Cumulative Layout Shift on the <body> tag #57212
    .NET 10 Planning
  • OpenAPI activates transformers too many times #57211
  • Should Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly be deprecated in favour of Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Resilience? #57209
  • Perf improvement: json #57205
  • DatabaseDeveloperPage is not shown for pending model changed by default with EF 9.0 #57204

Closed

  • IOptions<HealthCheckServiceOptions> seems to be registered in CreateSlimBuilder even though HealthChecks are not #56475
  • Published size improvement: todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #57220
  • Published size improvement: todosapivanilla #57206
  • Published size improvement: todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #57219
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot #57218
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #57217
  • Support for Pushed Authorization Requests in OidcHandler #51686
    9.0-preview7
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json #57168
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #57169
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #57200
  • Non-nullable form parameters should be marked `required` in the generated OpenAPI #57112

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement deep copy for OpenApiSchema instances #57223
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add hpack decoding test #57221
    needs-area-label
  • Update IdentityModel to 8.0.1 #57215
    area-infrastructure
  • Perf improvement: Fix Cumulative Layout Shift issue in blank Blazor templates #57213
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • *DO NOT MERGE* Test install-script.sh #57207
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • [6.0] Optionally respect HTTP/1.0 keep-Alive for HTTP.sys #57203
    * NO MERGE *, area-networking, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Use BaseTypeInfo API to fix up polymorphic schemas #56908
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-rc1
  • Use TryGetValue for dictionary lookups in OpenAPI comparers #57208
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, 9.0-rc1
  • Update milestones for September #57222
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
  • Update branding to 6.0.34 #57197
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.34
  • Update branding to 8.0.9 #57198
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.9
  • Use Ascii.ToUtf16 in StringUtilities #56578
    area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • Add client span to SignalR .NET client #57101
    area-signalr, 9.0-rc1
  • Update to Microsoft.OpenApi 1.6.17 #57201
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, area-minimal, 9.0-rc1
  • Set requiredness for primitive and files in forms #57196
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Allow `<FocusOnNavigate>` to work when rendered statically #57131
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] Fix AzDO area path for policy violations reporting #57105
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] Update Microsoft.IO.Redist dependency #57006
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [8.0] Optionally respect HTTP/1.0 keep-Alive for HTTP.sys #57182
    area-networking, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Docs/test updates/migration guidance for new runtime metrics in dotnet-counters #4806
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • [LoongArch64] Part-1:Add LoongArch64 support in src/shard directory #4835

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support direct use of Path's use in XAML #24084
  • [CollectionView] Add Analyzers or Debug warnings when users have placed a CV inside a container with infinite contraints #24078
    Backlog
  • iOS CarouselView height stretching page #24077
  • Unable to make UICalendarSelectionSingleDateDelegate working on iOS 17.5 in my handler #24074
  • Maui CollectionView reordering displays multiple group headers on iOS #24073
  • Trim warnings when publishing `dotnet new maui` for the first time #24062
  • [Android] AddEmbeddedResourceFont Shows Exception Warning in Output Window #24059

Closed

  • XA1018 Specified AndroidManifest #21406
  • Run .NET Multi-platform App UI development problem run under Windows 10 #22482
  • Label text overlap in HorizontalStackLayout #22130
    Backlog
  • Spect API For IOS Wallet and Android Wallet Maui Essentials #1890
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Maui-ified Android Gallery doesn't layout correctly #1607
    Backlog
  • Cannot Load JavaScript in WebView in .NET MAUI #24029
  • Shell: GoBack on Android shows sandwich menu #24054
  • Incorrect CollectionView height inside VerticalStackLayout #23359
  • Android : Border Stroke GradiantBrush can only switch to another gradiantbrush #22042
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst-resizetizer] SVG file does not generate density-dependent png files. #24030
  • Invalid scene used in WindowStateManager for iOS with CarPlay app #23910
    .NET 8 SR8
  • CS0616 error with NSPasteboard.NSPasteboardTypeString on latest workloads #24060
  • Warning in log about font #19774
    Backlog
  • Unable to hide NavigationBar #23567

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce WindowProvider and add to Scoped ServiceProvider #24081
  • Split template tests into parallel jobs #24080
  • Merge things from `release/9.0.1xx-preview7` into `net9.0` #24070
  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] Fix ToolbarItem font color issue after changing available state. #24065
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] Fix for Entry SelectionLength #24064
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Span Foreground property #24063
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9

Merged

  • Update bug-report.yml with 8.0.80 SR8 #24083
  • Remove the huge xcsync for now #24071
  • [Android] Border Stroke gradient can only switch to another gradient - fix #22168
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Bump macios to latest #24058

Updated

    9.0-rc1

    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Store all enums as string even if they are defined as nullable - MongoDB #34382
  • Improve type mapping inference on collections where no model reference is available #34378
    Backlog
  • ToJson should be configurable to not emit default values/allow missing properties when (De)serializing the column #34376
  • Sqlite: transform CROSS APPLY to projection when possible #34375
    Backlog
  • Should compiled queries work with FromRawSql? #34374
    Backlog

Closed

  • New Provider: Specification tests Projection with datetime subtraction #34296
  • `PrimaryKeyAttribute` handled after calling dependent entity configurator #34373
  • Projections on JSON columns containing array are not working #34367
  • Possible memory leak in relation to (larger) strings #34365

PullRequests

Created

  • fixing cosmos baselines to expect '$type' as the default discriminator name #34383
  • Optimize away DISTINCT inside IN/EXISTS/set operations #34381
  • Increase Linux CI timeout to accomodate additional Cosmos testing. #34380
  • Switch EntityFrameworkMetricsData.Get* methods to internal. These are consumed only by EF. #34379
  • Apply primary constructor cleanup everywhere #34377

Updated

  • Fix to #34211 - Issue occurs when trying to generate query string when mapping entity with json to a view with a custom schema #34239
  • New EF.Constant handling #34297
  • Basic FSharp test project and a single test. #34372
